import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import "./Events.css"; import Form from "react-bootstrap/Form"; import Row from "react-bootstrap/Row"; import Col from "react-bootstrap/Col"; import Button from "react-bootstrap/Button"; const EventDetails = ({ event }) => { const onClickDonate = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); }; return (
Title Description Target Reason Target Amount Begin Date End Date
); }; export default EventDetails;
